contentIntro: My dream is coming true, just 20,000 m3 to go. I've had this dream for a lot of years to build a waterski lake, and the only thing better... now it's starting to come true. Check back to see how this crazy adventure is going!
contentPricing:
2021 Schacres Lake Pricing:

Pay per set $55.00
10 set punchcard $500.00

Memberships:
- Single Preferred $400.00 upfront, $35.00 per set
- Single All Access $2,200.00 (max 3 sets/day)
- Family All Access $4,800.00 (max 8 sets/day)
